title: Was Sony Pictures Hack 'Cyber Vandalism' Or Something More?
teaser: President Obama to called the Sony Pictures hack as an act of "cyber vandalism." Robert Siegel talks to Alan Friedman, co-author of the book, Cybersecurity and Cyberwar: What Everyone Needs to Know, about that decision.
